entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cochrane
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
